title: Conservation cropping
creator_credit: Dept of Conservation, Forests and Land
brief_description: This compilation tape specifically targets the wheat and sheep area of the Mallee Region and looks at ways that soil erosion can be avoided. The four episodes shown are: “Trash is treasure.”, Blade aid”, “Croppers” and “Mallee Modifiers.
